tool.name: FASTA ID Swapper
tool.description: Reorders header line with strain/name from ending parentheticals
tool.help:
**What it does**
* This tool is to aid in clarifying the phage being examined for CLC as it uses the first uninterrupted string as the record name. * More options can be added to this if the need arises. * Currently it separates the last whitespace word and removes the closing bracket. It takes the value and appends it to the beginning of the header.
INPUT : FASTA file (single or multi)
METHOD : FASTA sequence where the strain/name at the end of the fasta header line is inserted at the beginning of the header.
OUTPUT : Swapped ID FASTA file.
